name: Orbit (Softalk)
overview: A shoot'em up created by Andrew S. Pakerski and published in both Loadstar #014, and later in Best of Loadstar #2. Have you ever wanted to shoot down enemy fighters like Luke Skywalker? If you have, then Orbit is for you. Orbit is a fast-paced game where you're flying through the vast emptiness of deep space and are attacked by fighters. your only choice is to fight to the death. The high-res background is your battlefield. On your control panel is a gauge the records the amount of damage you have sustained. When the gauge reaches 100%, it's lights out!! Fire when the enemy is within the crosshairs. You can even destroy his shots before they reach your ship.
